CSI Driver External Functions
CSI Driver

The section has a list of all the exported API which the applications need to invoke in order to use the driver. More...

Functions

int32_t CSI_phyParamsInit (CSI_DataRate dataRate, CSI_PhyParams *ptrPhyParams)

Detailed Description

The section has a list of all the exported API which the applications need to invoke in order to use the driver.

Function Documentation

int32_t CSI_close ( CSI_Handle  csiHandle,
int32_t *  errCode 
)

Description
The function is used to close the CSI Driver

Parameters
[in]csiHandleHandle to the CSI driver
[out]errCodeError code populated on error
Return values
Success- 0
Error- <0
CSI_Handle CSI_open ( CSI_Cfg *  ptrCfg,
int32_t *  errCode 
)

Description
The function is used to open and setup the CSI driver

Parameters
[in]ptrCfgPointer to the configuration
[out]errCodeError code populated on error
Return values
Success- Handle to the CSI Driver
Error- NULL
int32_t CSI_phyParamsInit ( CSI_DataRate  dataRate,
CSI_PhyParams *  ptrPhyParams 
)

Description
The function is used to populate the default PHY parameters

Parameters
[in]dataRateData Rate for which the PHY parameters will be configured
[out]ptrPhyParamsDefault PHY Parameters populated by the API
Return values
Notapplicable
